name: VR Maze (itch) (Mubanga)
description:
A VR Maze game I made in 1 week. 

WIndows and Quest build available.

Note that for the Quest you will need to figure out a way to side load .apk files on to your quest.

Check out my YouTube channel to see how I made this, and check in on my other project, where I build a town building game on tiny planet in VR.
